description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Kelty Hearts vs Montrose in the Scottish League One
title: Kelty Hearts vs Montrose: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Kelty Hearts vs Montrose: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Aulay Martin (Montrose) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Post
Attempt missed. Tam O'Ware (Kelty Hearts) header from very close range is just a bit too high following a corner.
Post
Craig Johnston (Kelty Hearts) wins a free kick on the right wing.
